labana 11 wanadayin pasu rata yali wiwrutha kirimen anathuruwa janathawa kriya kala yuthu aakaraya sambandhayen yuda hamudapathi luthinan jenaral shawendra silwa adahas dakwa sitiya.ee, hiru ti.wi osse ada (04) udasana wikashaya wu paththare wisthare wadasatahanata ekwemin.sama aayathanayakma pilipadiya yuthu saukhya karunu sambandhayen saukhya amathyanshaya wisin danuwath kirim sidukara athi bawada ohu ehidi prakashakara sitiya.hamudapathiwaraya wadiduratath adahas dakwamin pawasa sitiye kowid 19 mardana katayuthu waladi janathawa methek kriyakala aakaraya sambandhanayen janathawa wetha thama aacharaya pudakarana bawayi.
